name: Aethernal
description:
Fly free between the clouds and find the portal to jump to another cloudy dimension

  • If you or the portal spawn stuck between clouds restart with "R"
  • The player will follow the mouse
  • There's 10 dimensions with a unique color palette

Code & Art by: MOMEG


Music by Sersinquerer

this game was made for the MiniJam #74 "Power"

Have Fun
